attributes.action: Vaccinate all teachers during Easter break
attributes.additional_details: Since the children returned to school 3 days ago I already have 2 out of 3 children in isolation due to covid in the school. To help prevent any further loss of education and to keep teachers and staff in schools safe all teachers should be vaccinated during the Easter Holidays
attributes.background: To help prevent the start stop of school education get all teachers vaccinated during the Easter holiday

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554316
